title: How to publish a medical paper as an MBBS student - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: First chose a guide.. preferably a professor in your medical school. Then decide upon a topic that both of you would be interested in. Find out relevant references for it using online sites like pubmed. Draft a protocol. Get ethics clearance. Do your data collection. Write report. Submit it to various journals according to how they want it. They will publish it
